wikitext.*:
'''Dagorlad''', the Battle Plain, was named so for the number of battles took place on or near there:

* '''The [[Battle of Dagorlad]] ({{SA|3434}}), the first documented battle in the [[War of the Last Alliance]].'''
* An unnamed [[Second Battle of Dagorlad|battle]] ({{TA|1899}}) between [[Calimehtar (King of Gondor)|Calimehtar]] and the [[Wainriders]].
* The [[Disaster of the Morannon]] ({{TA|1944}}), between [[Kings of Gondor|King]] [[Ondoher]] of [[Gondor]] and the [[Wainriders]].
* The [[Battle of the Camp]] (also {{TA|1944}}), between [[Kings of Gondor|King]] [[Eärnil II]] of [[Gondor]] and the [[Wainriders]].
* The [[Battle of the Morannon]] ([[25 March|March 25]], {{TA|3019}}), between the [[Host of the West]] and the forces of [[Sauron]].

{{disambig}}
